title: How many people read 'Mein Kampf' by Adolf Hitler? - Quora

response.answer_text: Assumably, most married couples in Germany plus many more. Hitler had made it law for every newly married couple to purchase (yes, purchase, not to be given) a copy of Mein Kampf at their wedding. This, along with war preparations, massive construction jobs that provided jobs, and wartime plundering, was a major cause of Nazi wealth.
